Comment.Language: During the Holy Pascha Week and on the Feasts of the Cross:

Text.Language: V/e~tauasf e~pic~tauroc eke~qomqem m~p~catanac capec/t n~nen[alauj: cw] m~mon ouoh nai nan.
who was crucified on the Cross, trample Satan under our feet. Save us and have mercy on us.
يا من صلب علي الصليب اسحق الشيطان تحت أقدامنا خَلِّصْنا وارحَمْنا.
